info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 4:54PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds and brief heavy rainfall will impact portions of northeastern Albany, southeastern Saratoga, southwestern Washington, Rensselaer and southwestern Bennington Counties through 530 PM EST... At 452 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers along a line extending from near Round Lake to near Guilderland. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and brief heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads. The line of showers will be near... East Greenbush, Wyantskill and Wynantskill around 505 PM EST. West Sand Lake around 510 PM EST. Averill Park around 515 PM EST. Hoosick Falls around 520 PM EST. Bennington around 530 PM EST. Other locations impacted by these showers include Shakers, Bleecker Stadium, Albia, Johnsonville, Willow Glen, South Shaftsbury, Millers Corners, Wayville, Grays Corners and Hoosick. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 9 and 24. Interstate 87 between exits 23 and 7, and between exits 8A and 10. Interstate 787 between exits 1 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
